sentences.sContent: The defendant was convicted of high treason (= treason of the worst kind ) and sentenced to death.
sentences.sCn: 被告被判犯有严重叛国罪，并处以死刑。

words.tran: 叛逆的；谋反的；犯叛国罪的

trans.tranCn: 叛逆, 通敌, 背信
trans.tranOther: the crime of being disloyal to your country or its government, especially by helping its enemies or trying to remove the government using violence
